name: Spankbang
description: Spankbang video platform plugin for Grayjay with model search, recommendations, and improved creator profiles. Click 'Login' under Authentication to login and enable subscriptions, playlists, and history features.
author: GreyPluginDev

authentication.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; Pixel 7) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36

2: Fixed subscriptions support with proper auth
Fixed playlists support with proper auth
Added watch history support with thumbnails and duration
Added cookie validation and expiry detection
3: Changed authentication to use Login button
Click 'Login' under Authentication to sign in
Grayjay will automatically capture authentication cookies
Removed manual cookie entry from settings
